com.quantcomponents.marketdata
Interface IMarketDataProvider

public interface IMarketDataProvider

Low-level interface to be implemented by broker adapters to deal with market data

Nested Class Summary
static interface IMarketDataProvider.IMarketDepthListener
          Listener of price book updates
static interface IMarketDataProvider.IRealTimeDataListener
          Listener of realtime price bars
static interface IMarketDataProvider.ITickListener
          Listener of realtime price ticks

Method Detail

searchContracts

List<IContract> searchContracts(IContract criteria,
                                ITaskMonitor taskMonitor)
                                throws ConnectException,
                                       RequestFailedException
Search contracts based on criteria

Parameters:
criteria - a partially filled contract bean, to be used as criteria for search
taskMonitor - a task monitor to control the task
Returns:
a list of contracts matching the criteria
Throws:
ConnectException
RequestFailedException

historicalBars

List<IOHLCPoint> historicalBars(IContract contract,
                                Date startDateTime,
                                Date endDateTime,
                                BarSize barSize,
                                DataType dataType,
                                boolean includeAfterHours,
                                ITaskMonitor taskMonitor)
                                throws ConnectException,
                                       RequestFailedException
Retrieves the historical bars for a contract for a specific a time period

Parameters:
contract - the contract
startDateTime - start of the historical period
endDateTime - end of the historical period
barSize - bar size of the wanted data
dataType - data type requested
includeAfterHours - true if after hours trading data is requested, false otherwise
taskMonitor - a task monitor to control the task
Returns:
a list of price bars
Throws:
ConnectException
RequestFailedException

startRealTimeBars

void startRealTimeBars(IContract contract,
                       BarSize barSize,
                       DataType dataType,
                       boolean includeAfterHours,
                       IMarketDataProvider.IRealTimeDataListener listener)
                       throws ConnectException,
                              RequestFailedException
Starts the collection of realtime price bars

Parameters:
contract - the contract
barSize - the bar size of the data requested
dataType - the data type requested
includeAfterHours - true if after hours trading data is requested, false otherwise
listener - the price bar listener to be notified for each bar
Throws:
ConnectException
RequestFailedException

stopRealTimeBars

void stopRealTimeBars(IContract contract,
                      BarSize barSize,
                      DataType dataType,
                      boolean includeAfterHours,
                      IMarketDataProvider.IRealTimeDataListener listener)
                      throws ConnectException
Stops the collection of realtime price bars

Parameters:
contract - the contract
barSize - the bar size of the data requested
dataType - the data type requested
includeAfterHours - true if after hours trading data is requested, false otherwise
listener - the listener that must stop being notified for each bar
Throws:
ConnectException
